channel.title: Veena Vijai on
channel.description: Recent content in Veena Vijai on

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please fill out this form to directly get in touch over email! Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Habit Creation: From Ideas to Action
item.description: In July 2019, I finally got my hands on James Clear’s Atomic Habits, a book around which there has been much furore. I had a vague premonition, or rather, a sense of resignation, that I would forget the content just as quickly as I had absorbed it, as has been the case with many books I’ve read before (think Malcolm Gladwell). I sat comfortably on the library lawns outside the Doheny Library at USC on a warm afternoon and started off.

item.title: How to Build this Website
item.description: There are many options out there to build and host a website with a custom domain. The steps listed below are how I created this website by building with Hugo and hosting on Github pages with a custom domain from Google. Instructions Install Go. Follow the instructions on the page to unpack, export to PATH, and check the go version to ensure it’s been installed correctly. Install Hugo.

item.title: Chapter I: The Grand Hall
item.description: Three hundred and forty-eight years, six months, and nineteen days ago to-day, the Parisians awoke to the sound of all the bells in the triple circuit of the city, the university, and the town ringing a full peal. The sixth of January, 1482, is not, however, a day of which history has preserved the memory. There was nothing notable in the event which thus set the bells and the bourgeois of Paris in a ferment from early morning.
